title: saNNavanendu nA
sahitya:
saNNavanendu nA nambi baNNavella suregoNDu ciNNa bAlakanu endu tiNNa molegaLe koTTe


caraNam 1    gombeya maduveyendu nambisi tA kare tandu shambarAri satiya mane emballi kaiduDukida
    caraNam 2    cenneyanADuva endu cenniga tAnAgi bandu sanneyinda kai piDidu kenneya muddisi naDeda
    caraNam 3    uTTa sIregaLanella kaTTI iTTu jaladoLu neTTana iLiyalu nAvu taTTane tegedODida
    caraNam 4    kaNDa kaNDalli enna kaNDanandadali nODi bhaNDugEDu mADidanu puNDa ninna maganamma
    caraNam 5    smaranayyanu tA bandu seraga piDidu nindu neredu kaLuhidanamma purandara viTTalanu
